Information Retrieval Systems .A Swets, J.A. In this review I present the measures to some extent in the terms of their originators and to some extent in common terms which will make it easier to compare and contrast them with the measure proposed here. .X 54	1	1307 54	1	1307 73	6	1307 73	6	1307 134	1	1307 134	1	1307 175	1	1307 175	1	1307 176	1	1307 176	1	1307 319	1	1307 319	1	1307 474	1	1307 474	1	1307 509	1	1307 509	1	1307 519	3	1307 519	3	1307 565	1	1307 565	1	1307 566	1	1307 566	1	1307 587	1	1307 587	1	1307 625	1	1307 625	1	1307 649	1	1307 649	1	1307 660	1	1307 660	1	1307 752	1	1307 752	1	1307 764	1	1307 764	1	1307 780	5	1307 780	5	1307 785	3	1307 785	3	1307 810	1	1307 810	1	1307 812	1	1307 812	1	1307 824	1	1307 824	1	1307 829	2	1307 829	2	1307 895	3	1307 895	3	1307 1091	1	1307 1091	1	1307 1307	7	1307 1422	1	1307 1422	1	1307 1427	1	1307 1427	1	1307 1427	1	1307
